originalText.text: I recently had the pleasure of entrusting my beloved Bakhtari rug to the capable hands of Bakhtari Rug Cleaning's team, and the results were truly exceptional! Dan, the technician, displayed a profound understanding of rug materials and treated my cherished possession with the utmost delicacy. My rug now shines with renewed vibrancy, and I am absolutely thrilled with the outstanding service they provided.

originalText.text: These guys did an amazing carpet cleaning job I would recommend them to anyone. My carpets are white and were dirty they look amazing now.thank you rug cleaning for your professional work.

originalText.text: I would recommend this service to anyone. The gentleman was on time. He called before his arrival. He was very polite.  I have triple pets in my home and my carpets were in horrible shape. When Rug cleaning was done my carpets looked amazing. He got out all of the stains. He was efficient and in and out of my home in a very timely manner.  I would use this service again anytime.

originalText.text: Brian was fantastic!! He was super professional and met all of our needs. We had extreme pet odor and stains from urine & blood and he was able to get them all out and make the carpet look new again! We can’t thank him enough for his help & hard work! You also can’t beat the value of the service. We saved hundreds compared to professional rug  cleaning we’ve had in the past!

originalText.text: Very professional,  told us what area they will do first. Besides the carpet,  we also had them clean three sofas and two ottomans and a large area rug. The carpets,  sofa and rug looked  cleaner than other companies I've used and it was cheaper. Also the process was very quiet. Best rug cleaning company
